name: Diorama No.3 : The Marchland
description: Visit a tollbooth where a drop of rain makes the difference between presence and absence of the passerby. Are these ghosts, or could the spectator be one? Before you know it, you have crossed over into ‘The Marchland’. The Marchland is the 3rd virtual reality diorama in 'The Shoebox Diorama' series.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core I5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics Card: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better. Storage: 800 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This single scene is all about the atmosphere (and immersion) not much else to it, bit pricey for what it is.  Yet i still hope there is more from this creator, some great ideas thrown in.

It's what you see in trailer and screenshots, you can see that single scene in VR from couple of camera angles and that's it. It's not fun, interesting or anything really. Hardly worth 1€, let alone 5.
